info.name: FIS Public and Member API fis-ski.com
info.description:
Documentation for endpoints allowing to retreive information from FIS API through public and member endpoints.

Note to all API clients

Unless specifically communicated to a client, this API has a rate limit of 10 requests per minute. Please adhere to the `X-RateLimit-Limit` and `X-RateLimit-Remaining` response headers. FIS can reduce the rate limits at any moment without prior notice, so always utilize the least amount of requests as possible.

These endpoints are continuously evolving to cater to a broader range of client needs. Consequently, they may change without prior notice. We recommend checking this documentation regularly to stay updated on any changes or deprecation warnings. Additionally, we invite you to subscribe to the FIS IT Newsletter to receive updates about changes to IT services and FIS data structures.

Data from this API is exclusively for the use of the client to whom FIS has issued credentials, it is not to be redistributed or used for commercial purposes. Credentials are issued to national ski associations, organising committees of FIS events, and direct FIS partners but not to third parties. Contact Support: Name: FIS IT departement Email: it@fis-ski.com

query.description: Response will include athletes FIS points if this parameter is set to `true`.

If provided, will return points that were active at that date. If no date is provided then the currently active poitns will be returned. Has effect only if `includeFisPoints` parameter is set to `true`.
